title: Essential Consultants Receives $500,000 from Russian Oligarch-Linked Firm
summary: Cohen's shell company Essential Consultants receives $500,000 from Columbus Nova linked to Russian oligarch Vekselberg, plus $1.2M from Novartis and $200k from AT&T, turning hush money vehicle into influence peddling operation

sources.title: How money flowed through Cohen's shell company

notes: Total of $4M flowed through account 2017-2018. Vekselberg questioned by Mueller. Companies claimed seeking "insights" into administration. Shows shell company evolution from hush money to foreign influence vehicle.
